data.description: BIND zone and config file manipulation libs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
DNS::BIND contains two separate modules, one for manipulating
    RFC-1035 compliant DNS zone files, and the other for manipulating
    BIND configuration files.

    The two method libraries provide OO interfaces, allowing system
    programmers to create, configure, change or delete any type of
    information in bind zone or config files in an intuitive manner. The
    configuration information is stored internally in a flexible and
    logical structure, which can be accessed through consistent methods
    provided in the packages.
